constants.text:
import { join } from 'node:path';

/**
 * SRC_DIR variable - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export const SRC_DIR = join(process.cwd(), 'src');
/**
 * OUTPUT_FILE variable - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export const OUTPUT_FILE = join(SRC_DIR, '.codebase.json');

const _REPLACER = '-|||-';

/**
 * REPLACERS variable - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export const REPLACERS = {
  code: [
    ['\\`', `${_REPLACER}w`],
    ['`', '\\`'],
    ['${', `$${_REPLACER}{`],
    ['\\s', `${_REPLACER}s`],
    ['\\w', `${_REPLACER}w`],
  ],
  init: [
    [new RegExp('\\`', 'g'), '`'],
    [_REPLACER, ''],
  ],
} as const;

schemas.text:
import * as v from 'valibot';

// Schema pour DeclarationKind
/**
 * DeclarationKindSchema variable - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export const DeclarationKindSchema = v.picklist([
  'function',
  'class',
  'interface',
  'type',
  'variable',
  'const',
  'let',
  'enum',
]);

// Schema pour ImportInfo
/**
 * ImportInfoSchema variable - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export const ImportInfoSchema = v.object({
  moduleSpecifier: v.string(),
  kind: v.picklist(['default', 'named', 'namespace', 'side-effect']),
  namedImports: v.optional(v.array(v.string())),
  default: v.optional(v.string()),
  isDynamic: v.optional(v.boolean()),
});

// Schema pour ExportInfo
/**
 * ExportInfoSchema variable - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export const ExportInfoSchema = v.object({
  name: v.string(),
  kind: v.picklist(['default', 'named', 'namespace']),
  text: v.optional(v.string()),
  moduleSpecifier: v.optional(v.string()),
  declarationKind: v.optional(DeclarationKindSchema),
});

// Schema pour FileAnalysis
/**
 * FileAnalysisSchema variable - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export const FileAnalysisSchema = v.object({
  relativePath: v.string(),
  imports: v.array(ImportInfoSchema),
  exports: v.array(ExportInfoSchema),
  text: v.string(),
});

// Schema pour CodebaseAnalysis
/**
 * CodebaseAnalysisSchema variable - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export const CodebaseAnalysisSchema = v.record(
  v.string(),
  FileAnalysisSchema,
);

// Schema pour les statistiques d'analyse
/**
 * AnalysisStatsSchema variable - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export const AnalysisStatsSchema = v.object({
  files: v.number(),
  imports: v.number(),
  exports: v.number(),
});

// Schema complet pour un fichier .code contenant l'analyse complète
/**
 * CodeAnalysisFileSchema variable - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export const CodeAnalysisFileSchema = v.object({
  CODEBASE_ANALYSIS: CodebaseAnalysisSchema,
  STATS: v.optional(AnalysisStatsSchema),
});

// Types inférés des schémas
/**
 * DeclarationKind type - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export type DeclarationKind = v.InferOutput<typeof DeclarationKindSchema>;
/**
 * ImportInfo type - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export type ImportInfo = v.InferOutput<typeof ImportInfoSchema>;
/**
 * ExportInfo type - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export type ExportInfo = v.InferOutput<typeof ExportInfoSchema>;
/**
 * FileAnalysis type - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export type FileAnalysis = v.InferOutput<typeof FileAnalysisSchema>;
/**
 * CodebaseAnalysis type - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export type CodebaseAnalysis = v.InferOutput<
  typeof CodebaseAnalysisSchema
>;
/**
 * AnalysisStats type - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export type AnalysisStats = v.InferOutput<typeof AnalysisStatsSchema>;
/**
 * CodeAnalysisFile type - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export type CodeAnalysisFile = v.InferOutput<
  typeof CodeAnalysisFileSchema
>;

utils.text:
/**
 * pathToDotNotation function - Auto-generated expression
 * 
 * ⚠️ WARNING: This expression is auto-generated and should not be modified.
 * Any manual changes will be overwritten during the next generation.
 * 
 * @generated
 * @readonly
 * @author chlbri (bri_lvi@icloud.com)
 */
export function pathToDotNotation(filePath: string): string {
  return filePath
    .replace(/\.ts$/, '') // Enlever l'extension .ts
    .replace(/\//g, '.'); // Remplacer les / par des .
}
